titleStmt.title: The middle way betwixt. The second part being an apologetical vindication of the former / by John Turner.
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, b. 1649 or 50.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Sympson ... and are to be sold by him and Fincham Gardiner ...,

notesStmt.note: Also appears as part of Middle way betwixt necessity and freedom (Wing T3312aA) at reels 584:1 and 2100:26.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
